identity.name: E1_Corporate_SaaS
identity.core_principle: Wine Red is the scalpel, not the bucket. Use it for precision actions, not generic fills.

usage_rules: NEVER use gradients for the Primary color. It must be solid, authoritative Wine Red.
Background is NOT white. It is #f4f6fb. Cards ARE white.
Use 'Soft' (#fbeff3) for active states in navigation and secondary buttons.
Text on 'Soft' background must be Primary (#8b1530), not Black.

buttons.primary: bg-[#8b1530] text-white hover:bg-[#701126] shadow-md hover:shadow-lg transition-all duration-200 font-medium px-6 py-2.5 rounded-lg
buttons.secondary: bg-[#fbeff3] text-[#8b1530] hover:bg-[#f0dce4] border border-[#fbeff3] hover:border-[#eeccd9] transition-all duration-200 font-medium px-6 py-2.5 rounded-lg

cards.base: bg-white border border-slate-100 shadow-[0_2px_8px_rgba(0,0,0,0.04)] hover:shadow-[0_4px_12px_rgba(0,0,0,0.06)] transition-shadow duration-300 rounded-xl p-6

inputs.base: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-200 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-white file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-500 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-[#8b1530] focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

banner.style: fixed top-0 left-0 right-0 z-50 bg-[#8b1530] text-white text-sm font-medium py-2 px-4 text-center shadow-sm
banner.content: Primero se ejecuta la incorporación al espacio de datos. Después se solicita la ayuda para subvencionar esos costes.

whatsapp_float.style: fixed bottom-6 right-6 z-50 bg-[#25D366] hover:bg-[#20bd5a] text-white p-4 rounded-full shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300 hover:-translate-y-1 flex items-center justify-center

setup: Configure tailwind.config.js with the specific color palette provided.
Install 'lucide-react' for icons if not present.
Ensure 'react-router-dom' is set up with a Layout component that includes the Fixed Banner and WhatsApp button.
Create a 'ProtectedLayout' component that handles RBAC redirection.
routing: Use standard React Router v6/v7 <Routes> and <Route>.
styling: Apply the 'Plus Jakarta Sans' font to all headings.
Ensure the Banner is visible on ALL pages (including Login).
Use the 'Soft' color (#fbeff3) for sidebar active states or card accents.
functionality: Create a 'UserContext' that stores { role: 'admin' | 'asesor' | 'cliente', name: string }.
Implement a simple login form that accepts any email but checks specific passwords for roles (e.g., 'admin123' -> admin role) for demo purposes.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for the Primary color.
Always use the specific hex codes provided.
Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
